mapper.insert: insert into `channel` (name, costNumber, uid, pwd, url) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update `channel` set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, costNumber = #{costNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, costNumber, uid, pwd, url from `channel`
